archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Collateral Allocation Management
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Description: Administer the holding and allocation of collateral on behalf of a customer
Control record: Collateral asset record (asset reference, asset type, asset properties/description, title, location, jurisdiction, associated document references, contacts/interested parties, current valuation and valuation history), Collateral allocation details (party, product/facility reference, committed amount, committed duration, title hierarchy), Collateral allocation schedule (asset reference, amount, product/facility reference, date/time)
